channel.title: CVE Feed for Silicon Labs -- Z-Wave SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Silicon Labs -- Z-Wave SDK

item.title: CVE-2023-51395|2024-03-07T04:50:54.651Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description: The vulnerability described by CVE-2023-0972 has been additionally discovered in Silicon Labs Z-Wave end devices. This vulnerability may allow an unauthenticated attacker within Z-Wave range to overflow a stack buffer, leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-22472|2024-06-04T17:52:56.713Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description:
A buffer Overflow vulnerability in Silicon Labs 500 Series Z-Wave devices may allow Denial of Service, and potential Remote Code execution
This issue affects all versions of Silicon LabsÂ 500 Series SDK prior to v6.85.2
running on Silicon Labs 500 series Z-wave devices.
